summary: Page 27 (book page 47/mem-zayin). Covers continuation of section 95, then sections 96-100. The grouping header 'אהבה ויראה' is correctly identified. Section numbers are accurate. Two continuation fragments at top for the multi-part continuation from section 95.

issues.description: Same as page 26 issue: the text references 'קידושין לג:' but should be 'קידושין לד.' for the standard mitzvot aseh shehazman grama sugya.
The second body paragraph of section 100 has no source_ref field at all. The text ends mid-sentence ('אוכל פירות בעוה"ז') suggesting it continues to the next page where the source ref may appear.
The text reads 'איכא מ"ד לתינוקות שמוליכים לבית רבן בכל ר"ח' - looking at the image, this appears to be correctly captured. The source ref 'מטבע שטבעו חכמים אות איתי, ב"ח או"ח תיט' also matches.
